img_summary: This image depicts the **Sobering Stone**, a rare item in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is described as a foul-scented stone, used to sober up the drunken boar man character. The item can be found in a vase in the village at **Yellow Sand Formation - Windrest Bridge**, to the left upon entering the village. Its narrative role involves aiding progression by interacting with the boar man near the **Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat Shrine**.
